review: I only gave it 1 star simply since it isn't possible to rate it lower. I've always been a fan of the quality put into most Amazon products but this streaming device can be best described with one word, GARBAGE. This thing conveniently stopped working shortly after the return period was up. By stopped working I mean dropping the wireless connection constantly or the video will freeze every minute for a solid 10 seconds. I don't reccomend this to anyone serious about switching to streaming as a viewing option. Spend the money on a roku or Apple tv.
